// Generated by Selenium IDE

import org.openqa.selenium.*;
import org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeDriver;
import org.openqa.selenium.interactions.Actions;

import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.Map;

public  class WithdrawalTest {

    private WebDriver driver;
    private Map<String, Object> vars;
    JavascriptExecutor js;

    public void setUp() {
        System.setProperty("webdriver.chrome.driver", "resources/chromedriver.exe");
        driver = new ChromeDriver();
        js = (JavascriptExecutor) driver;
        vars = new HashMap<String, Object>();
    }

    public void tearDown() {
        driver.quit();
    }

   // tai khoan khong du
    public void withdrawal() {
        driver.get("http://www.demo.guru99.com/V4/");
        driver.manage().window().setSize(new Dimension(1516, 823));
        driver.findElement(By.name("uid")).click();
        driver.findElement(By.name("password")).sendKeys("ypEvEmE");
        driver.findElement(By.name("uid")).sendKeys("mngr332128");
        driver.findElement(By.name("btnLogin")).click();
        driver.findElement(By.linkText("Withdrawal")).click();
        driver.findElement(By.name("accountno")).click();
        driver.findElement(By.name("accountno")).sendKeys("93550");
        driver.findElement(By.name("ammount")).click();
        driver.findElement(By.name("ammount")).sendKeys("6000000");
        driver.findElement(By.name("desc")).click();
        driver.findElement(By.name("desc")).sendKeys("rut lan1");
        driver.findElement(By.name("AccSubmit")).click();
    }
    // khong nhap so tien
    public void withdrawal02() {
        driver.get("http://www.demo.guru99.com/V4/");
        driver.manage().window().setSize(new Dimension(1516, 824));
        driver.findElement(By.name("uid")).click();
        driver.findElement(By.name("password")).sendKeys("ypEvEmE");
        driver.findElement(By.name("uid")).sendKeys("mngr332128");
        driver.findElement(By.name("btnLogin")).click();
        driver.findElement(By.linkText("Withdrawal")).click();
        driver.findElement(By.name("accountno")).click();
        driver.findElement(By.name("accountno")).sendKeys("93550");
        driver.findElement(By.name("desc")).click();
        driver.findElement(By.name("desc")).sendKeys("rut lan 2");
        driver.findElement(By.name("AccSubmit")).click();
    }
    // rut thanh cong
    public void test03() {
        driver.get("http://www.demo.guru99.com/V4/");
        driver.manage().window().setSize(new Dimension(1516, 824));
        driver.findElement(By.name("uid")).click();
        driver.findElement(By.name("password")).sendKeys("ypEvEmE");
        driver.findElement(By.name("uid")).sendKeys("mngr332128");
        driver.findElement(By.name("btnLogin")).click();
        driver.findElement(By.linkText("Withdrawal")).click();
        driver.findElement(By.name("accountno")).click();
        driver.findElement(By.name("accountno")).click();
        driver.findElement(By.name("accountno")).sendKeys("93550");
        driver.findElement(By.name("ammount")).click();
        driver.findElement(By.name("ammount")).sendKeys("20000");
        {
            WebElement element = driver.findElement(By.name("desc"));
            Actions builder = new Actions(driver);
            builder.moveToElement(element).clickAndHold().perform();
        }
        {
            WebElement element = driver.findElement(By.name("desc"));
            Actions builder = new Actions(driver);
            builder.moveToElement(element).perform();
        }
        {
            WebElement element = driver.findElement(By.name("desc"));
            Actions builder = new Actions(driver);
            builder.moveToElement(element).release().perform();
        }
        driver.findElement(By.name("desc")).click();
        driver.findElement(By.name("desc")).sendKeys("rut lan 4");
        driver.findElement(By.name("AccSubmit")).click();
    }
    public static void main(String[] arg) {
        WithdrawalTest test = new WithdrawalTest();
        test.setUp();
        test.withdrawal();
    }
}
